replies.body: Wooop, woop! You can only imagine how much attention an announcement like this would create in the North American region. But for now, let's keep Oceania alive, so maybe one day it will triumph as an equal to its big brother.

carn you aus dogs 

rip them a new behind

>;D

I hope someone lets Shaco out of his box
<3{{champion:35}}
